content: this is a simple and unique blanket made using the filet technique of crochet this pattern is written in us terms there is a listing for uk terms too it is such an addictive technique to use as you slowly see the pattern emerging with each finished row it uses dk yarn and a 4 5 mm hook but you can use any to suit your preference but this will alter the size of your blanket it uses approximately 400g of yarn 100g for each linked heart panel and 100g for the separating sections and border if made following this pattern a larger blanket will need more yarn the pattern consists of written instructions as well as a chart there are instructions on how to amend the size of the blanket too you can purchase an ad free pdf version of this pattern from my etsy shop uk terms and us terms available search for stitched up by emma or linked hearts blanket if you are looking for some colour inspiration please visit #linkedheartsblanket on instagram
